columns.text:
Mykonos. The most cosmopolitan island of Cyclades. The most famous island and the place that most people want to go for their holidays.

The island of the winds, as they call it, is almost in the center of Cyclades islands and between Tino and Naxo. It’s the closest island to Dilo. Boats from the port of Mykono’s make trips to the sacred island of antiquity.

Mykonos is one of the first islands in Greece that made tourist worth of its natural pores, sun and sea. It started to spread its rumor in the middle 1950’s when the first visitors started to arrive in the island. Impressed from the authentic beauty of the houses and the beautiful beaches, turned to be the best advertisers of the island. The residents realizing this difference started to create the proper foundation.

items.title: Pietra E Mare Mykonos
items.description: Set on an oceanfront cliff overlooking the Aegean Sea and Kalo Livadi, Pietra e Mare is re-constructed in a minimal style with fine elegance. Stylish and spacious with breath-taking views, the 31 guest rooms offer ultimate relaxation moments. The Pietra e Mare 4 star Hotel in Kalo Livadi Mykonos, Greece features 30 beautiful sea view rooms and honeymoon suites tastefully furnished to combine the fine coziness of the Cycladic tradition with modern facilities and contemporary design. Guests are invited to experience the most unforgettable holidays in this luxury beach hotel in Kalo Livadi Mykonos. Perfectly located in the picturesque Kalo Livadi, just 12 km away from Mykonos town, the beautiful beach hotel is overlooking the azure waters of the Aegean Sea. As a proud member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, Pietra e Mare combines unparalleled services and leading luxury in an exceptional setting, inviting guests to experience memorable moments of calm and serenity. Indulge yourself in a culinary fiesta at our brand new A la carte restaurant overlooking the Aegean Sea or chill out by the bar. Located at the highest level of the property, our restaurant which accommodates up to 25 persons is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, with exclusive signature courses, based on Mediterranean & Greek cuisine. Breakfast is Buffet style, with a wide selection of A La Carte warm dishes. Our outdoor fresh water pool features queen size sunbeds for your relaxation and a monasterial style table, ideal for reading or enjoying a quick snack. Our private beach with sunbeds and umbrellas and our intimate garden lounge area with hammocks & cushions between the palm trees turn into the ultimate hideaway.

items.title: Boheme
items.description: Experience Mykonos in a way you will never forget! Just a stone’s throw from the unique Mykonian Windmills and the popular Little Venice, Bohème is a Mykonos Town Luxury Hotel, built according to the traditional Cycladic architecture standards, with luxurious suites, some of them with outdoor Jacuzzi and Bohemian facilities. BE LAVISH, BE ALIVE, BE YOURSELF…BE BOHEME! With impeccable service and contemporary, naturally modern style, the retreat offers high levels of hospitality coupled with untouched privacy. The hotel’s team offers personalized concierge services on car rental, excursions, reservations, transfers, massage sessions and spa treatments, satisfying the variety of every personal request…Discover the coordinates of the ultimate serenity, well hidden in Boheme’s heart. With unobstructed views of the sunset & the Aegean Sea, flavors & aromas of a long tradition blended with innovating ideas, inspiring tunes, framed by the island’s positive vibes, the Bilo Bar is a meet & mingle must! The in-house mixologist & more will amaze you with drinks and cocktails, wines & bubbles, starting around sunset time. Before the night stroll in Little Venice & Mykonos’ mazy alleys, be part of the perfect scenery to socialize! An alternative menu, in absolute harmony with the drink list, includes refreshing & simple options. Situated by the pool, with breathtaking Sea views and providing a Mediterranean locally sourced cuisine based on the seasonal products of the sea and land of Mykonos, during lunch and dinner hours. Feel free to stroll around our gardens and hand-pick your favorite ingredient as a base for your meal. Drinks and cocktails served by the bar and lounge area, enjoying the breathtaking sunset views of Mykonos, accompanied with inspiring vibes. Boheme is located 2 minutes walking distance from Mykonos town, having a unique sunset view to the island of Delos and panoramic sea views.
items.excerpt: Experience Mykonos in a way you will never forget!
